Brief of the files and folder under this directory 
==============================================
This directory contains Ambiq Owned OTA images. Each directory with an OTA image has a Jlink Script to load
and initiate the OTA process for that image.

cm4_ble_updates/ :
	-- Contains the released versions of the BLE firmware OTA.
	
cm4_xtalhs_only/:
	-- Contains the released versions of the factory installed XTALHS_only firmware OTA.
	
sbl_updates/:
	-- Contains the released versions of the Apollo330P SBL OTA.
